message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a significant amount. I'm not willing to disclose the exact value to me, but I can assure you it's no less than $1200000.  I'm confident this product has the potential to be very valuable to you as well.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.  This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
